c74object.name: av.movieplay~
c74object.description: A wrapper around the jit.movie object, allowing you to play the movie with an audiosignal, similar to the play~ object in the msp-domain. Incoming signal sets the position in ms. Modes wrap and fold allow the signal value to exceed the playback length. Use the render bang to output the frames as a texture. The video is automatically loaded into ram if possible. cache_size defaults to 1 gb.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Control playback with a signal representing current millisecond position in movie
method.description: Control playback with a signal representing current millisecond position in movie
